projects.name: Motion Sneakers
projects.description: Motion Sneakers is an online store for selling sneakers. The project is built with React and fetches data through a Node API. Users can sign up and make purchases. The project is non-commercial in nature.

projects.name: Angry Match
projects.description: Angry Match it is a Memory game where you can choose the theme of your cards. Our mascot gets easily annoyed, so pay close attention.
